fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.software.interfacecartagen.utilities.bookmarks

Class BookmarkSet

  • Object
    • BookmarkSet

  • public class BookmarkSet
extends Object
    Author:
    GTouya A bookmark set is an organised set of bookmarks that represent stored localisations of the visualisation panel of CartAGen application.

      • saveToXml

        public void saveToXml()
               throws IOException,
                      TransformerException
        Save the bookmarks in XML. The name and the path of the file are chosen by the user in a JFileChooser if the storingFile field is null.
        Throws:
        TransformerException
        IOException
